saveAfterEditInOpenBuffers.description: Whether an open buffer should be saved after a rename operation. If enabled, open buffers will be saved **if** they were not modified at the time of the rename. If disabled, open buffers will not be saved automatically.

offerUndoNotification.description: If enabled, will show a notification after a successful rename that lists the affected files and offers an <kbd>Undo</kbd> button.

enableDebugLogging.description: Whether to log diagnostic messages to the console.
